title: 86/184/ECSC: Commission Decision of 2 April 1986 establishing the delivery levels of ECSC steel products of Spanish origin onto the rest of the common market, excluding Portugal (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 2 April 1986
establishing the delivery levels of ECSC steel products of Spanish origin onto the rest of the common market, excluding Portugal
(Only the Spanish text is authentic)
(86/184/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Deliveries of ECSC steel products of Spanish origin onto the rest of the Community market, excluding Portugal, may not exceed 850 000 tonnes.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 April 1986.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Vice-President
